form.official-title: To prohibit the Federal Government from using facial recognition technology as a means of identity verification, and for other purposes.

section.header: Prohibition on certain Federal Government use of facial recognition technology

subsection.text: An agency of the Federal Government may not use facial recognition technology as a means of identity verification.

In this section, the term facial recognition technology means a contemporary security system that automatically identifies and verifies the identity of an individual from a digital image or video frame.
